body.bibl: Muravjev, Alexej V. “Macarian or Evagrian: The Problem of Origenist Legacy in Eastern Syriac Mystical Literature.” In Origeniana Octava: Origen and the Alexandrian Tradition / Origene e La Tradizione Alessandrina.
